original_text: His disciples did not understand these things at first, but when Jesus was glorified, then they remembered that these things had been written about him and had been done to him.
korean_text: 제자들은 처음에 이 일을 깨닫지 못하였다가 예수께서 영광을 얻으신 후에야 이것이 예수께 대하여 기록된 것임과 사람들이 예수께 이같이 한 것임이 생각났더라

sentences.original_text: His disciples did not understand these things at first
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들은 처음에 이것들을 이해하지 못했지만

sentences.original_text: that these things had been written about him
and had been done to him
